job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Power up our site infrastructure to keep pace with the company's explosive growth and cutting-edge advancements!
     * Set the standard for observability best practices across our entire tech stack, making sure nothing escapes our keen eyes.
     * Take the helm and pioneer the creation of a fully automated, developer self-service platform, unleashing lightning-fast execution and seamless continuous delivery.
     * Blaze a trail by researching, developing, and implementing top-notch infrastructure management standards for our cloud accounts (AWS and GCP).
     * Collaborate with our AI team to construct an infrastructure that ignites rapid, high-scale deep learning exploration, development, and deployment.
     * Stand tall as the champion of our DevOps culture, empowering our product teams to conquer tasks at warp speed with utmost safety.
     * Dive into the on-call rotation, fearlessly debugging and resolving issues that dare to impede our progress.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about How Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Cloud Platform Engineer

* Power up our site infrastructure to keep pace with the company's explosive growth and cutting-edge advancements!
     * Set the standard for observability best practices across our entire tech stack, making sure nothing escapes our keen eyes.
     * Take the helm and pioneer the creation of a fully automated, developer self-service platform, unleashing lightning-fast execution and seamless continuous delivery.
     * Blaze a trail by researching, developing, and implementing top-notch infrastructure management standards for our cloud accounts (AWS and GCP).
     * Collaborate with our AI team to construct an infrastructure that ignites rapid, high-scale deep learning exploration, development, and deployment.
     * Stand tall as the champion of our DevOps culture, empowering our product teams to conquer tasks at warp speed with utmost safety.
     * Dive into the on-call rotation, fearlessly debugging and resolving issues that dare to impede our progress.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about How Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on cloud platform engineering, infrastructure management, and DevOps practices, with a secondary mention of supporting an AI team. While it involves supporting AI development, the core responsibilities and technologies are not directly related to building or fine-tuning AI models themselves, nor are they focused on the core tasks of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. The role is primarily infrastructure-centric, making it fall under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's not a direct AI/ML development role.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'pioneer the creation of a fully automated, developer self-service platform, unleashing lightning-fast execution and seamless continuous delivery' implies building and maintaining software systems, specifically a platform for developers, which aligns with software development principles.
job_tasks.phrase: pioneer the creation of a fully automated, developer self-service platform, unleashing lightning-fast execution and seamless continuous delivery

job_tasks.justification: The role emphasizes setting standards for observability, creating automated platforms for continuous delivery, and championing DevOps culture, which are all core components of operations engineering and MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Set the standard for observability best practices across our entire tech stack

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'continuous delivery' directly relates to the deployment and operational aspects of software and infrastructure management.
Implementing infrastructure management standards for cloud accounts is a key part of operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: implementing top-notch infrastructure management standards for our cloud accounts

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating to construct infrastructure for deep learning exploration, development, and deployment points to the operational support required for AI/ML workloads.
job_tasks.phrase: construct an infrastructure that ignites rapid, high-scale deep learning exploration, development, and deployment

job_tasks.justification: Championing DevOps culture and empowering product teams to perform tasks quickly and safely falls under the umbrella of operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Stand tall as the champion of our DevOps culture, empowering our product teams to conquer tasks at warp speed with utmost safety

job_tasks.justification: Being part of an on-call rotation and debugging/resolving issues is a critical aspect of operations engineering, ensuring system reliability and uptime.
job_tasks.phrase: Dive into the on-call rotation, fearlessly debugging and resolving issues that dare to impede our progress

soft_skills.phrase: Stand tall as the champion of our DevOps culture
Take the helm and pioneer the creation
Blaze a trail by researching, developing, and implementing
